text: Humor is realism carried to its ultimate consequences. Except for a lot of humorous literature, everything a man does is funny or humorous. In wars it ceases to be so because during these the man ceases to be so. Eduardo Torres said: "Man is not content to be the stupidest animal in the universe; he is allowed the luxury of being the only ridiculous". The end of the world
title: Humorismo
author: Augusto Monterroso
